g-0: ^[The stranger looks to be rather dumbfounded.]
^We, uh… don’t get a whole lot of visitors.
^[The stranger sheepishly rubs the back of his neck.]
g-1: ^I’d offer to help fix up that boat of yours, but…
^[Bengt shifts awkwardly before he continues on.]
^I’m sorry to say, I don’t think it can be salvaged.
g-2: ^But, hey! You’re in one piece, at least! No need to look so glum!
g-3: ^Anyway, what happened just now? What was that... thing that attacked me?
^[Bengt hums and scratches his head before he speaks up again.]
^Well, uh, surprise! That’s what attacked you.
g-4: ^Oh, shoot! I don’t mean to scare you or anything.
^It’s a real menace. We have our ways of avoiding it, but… for an outsider, that must be quite a shock.
^Actually, a lot of things about this archipelago might seem weird to you. It’s a pretty strange place.
^When you’ve lived here as long as me, you just sorta get used to it!
^[You’re at a complete loss for words, but Bengt just laughs heartily.]
g-5: ^I was sent this letter by someone who claims to live around here.
^[Bengt ponders for a moment before his eyes widen.]
^Well, we did find a boat, but that was a whole decade ago.
^Sorry, letters are… not very easy to send out from here.
^Whoever wrote this might’ve been trying to reach you for a very long time by now.

c-7: ^Did you happen to see my parents at all, back then? Do you know where they were going?
^Err, no... I can't really help you there, unfortunately.

g-6: ^I see. That makes things harder for me...
^That boat belonged to your parents, then?
^I guess I owe it to you to give it back, but it’s in bad shape.
^It still works, but I don’t recommend taking it outside the archipelago.
^The Kraken has a mean habit of preventing anyone from leaving.
^We'll want to make sure your boat can withstand some pushback before you try to leave.
g-7: ^You mentioned you’re a mechanic. Could you improve the boat for me?
^Some work for these idle hands? Why, I’d be happy to help you!
^In fact, there's one upgrade I can work in for you right now.
^It's common around here for our boats to have gliders attached.
^Ride over a ramp, and you'll be soaring a good while!
^You can even use it to evade the Kraken, if necessary. It could come in handy when you leave.
g-8: ^I'll go ahead and add that on now, then.
^Give me a moment! I'll be right back.
^[You hear a collection of bangs and clanks until he pops back out, wiping sweat off his brow.]
^But there are several more upgrades you'll need, and I won't be able to help you with all of them.
^You'll have to seek out my friends for that.
^They each have different skillsets they could put to use for you.

c-11: ^Oh, right! Let me tell you how to avoid that meddlesome thing.
^You can tell it's nearby by looking at the water.
^If there's a spot where it bubbles, that's where the Kraken is lurking.
^Just go around it and you'll be fine. Easy as pie!
^Should you happen to run into it, swat at its tentacles! That oughta drive it away.

g-9: ^Alright, sounds good. I'll look for them.
^Good luck out there. And come see me anytime you feel like chatting!
